body_html:
Can you try installing the protobuf using pip install --upgrade https://storage.googleapis.com/tensorflow/linux/cpu/protobuf-3.0.0-cp27-none-linux_x86_64.whl

You can download the .whl file on another machine, and after transferring it to the one that is not connected to the internet, do pip install --upgrade my_package_file.whl
body_text:
Can you try installing the protobuf using pip install --upgrade https://storage.googleapis.com/tensorflow/linux/cpu/protobuf-3.0.0-cp27-none-linux_x86_64.whl
You can download the .whl file on another machine, and after transferring it to the one that is not connected to the internet, do pip install --upgrade my_package_file.whl
body:
Can you try installing the protobuf using `pip install --upgrade https://storage.googleapis.com/tensorflow/linux/cpu/protobuf-3.0.0-cp27-none-linux_x86_64.whl`

You can download the `.whl` file on another machine, and after transferring it to the one that is not connected to the internet, do `pip install --upgrade my_package_file.whl`
